name: Delacour's marmoset rat
description: Delacour's marmoset rat, also known as the lesser marmoset rat, is an arboreal species of rodent in the family Muridae. It is found in China, Laos, and Vietnam. Its natural habitat is montane subtropical or tropical dry forest at elevations from 1,200 to 1,500Â m. It is threatened by habitat loss.
